metadata.name: Self-Portrait with Izzy
metadata.description:
Part of my Pillow Fort series exploring my mental health through self-portraiture and textile manipulation. 

The self-portrait was created during a period of self-isolation. They are a continuation of my digital textile art practice where I bring fabrics and textiles from my studio and everyday life into my digital practice. These works are digital collages constructed from manipulated photographs of the fabrics of pillows I was sleeping on and piling around me for comfort during my self isolation. 


Self-Portrait with Izzy
0:13
2400p x 2400p, MP4 
December 2021
1/1
